description: EasyPost is a flexible, modern API that makes it easy to add shipping and tracking to your app. Sign up and start shipping. Thousands of developers already have.

blocks.name: trackPackage
blocks.description: Create a new tracker to track a package, and get it's current transit status.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: The api key obtained from Easy Post.

args.name: trackingCode
args.info: The tracking code associated with the package you'd like to track

args.name: carrier
args.info: The carrier associated with the trackingCode you provided. The carrier will get auto-detected if none is provided

blocks.name: getTrackers
blocks.description: Get all package tracked by the API key.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: The api key obtained from Easy Post.

args.name: trackingCode
args.info: Only returns Trackers with the given trackingCode

args.name: carrier
args.info: Only returns Trackers with the given carrier value

args.name: pageSize
args.info: The number of Trackers to return on each page. The maximum value is 100

args.name: startDatetime
args.info: Only return Trackers created after this timestamp. Defaults to 1 month ago, or 1 month before a passed endDatetime. Format: 2016-01-02T00:00:00Z

args.name: endDatetime
args.info: Only return Trackers created after this timestamp. Defaults to 1 month ago, or 1 month before a passed startDatetime. Format: 2016-01-02T00:00:00Z

args.name: beforeId
args.info: Optional pagination parameter. Only trackers created before the given ID will be included. May not be used with afterId. Format: trk_

args.name: afterId
args.info: Optional pagination parameter. Only trackers created after the given ID will be included. May not be used with beforeId. Format: trk_

blocks.name: getTracker
blocks.description: Get a package tracker by it's ID.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: The api key obtained from Easy Post.

args.name: trackingId
args.info: OUnique tracker ID. Use tracking ID or tracking code
